descriptionHtml:
My take on a realistic horse mesh/shape. Exstensive body sculptering work. From skullsize to tail to leg angles.

[youtube][/youtube]

COMPATIBLE WITH ALL MODS THAT I KNOW OF. JUST INSTALL LAST.

Bugs:
The horses ass looks a bit pouty when riding, and seeing it from the side. You won't notice since the camera is behind

Future:
Shadowmere

===========================================
